translation.en: How are you gonna keep him from running downtown and going to 7- Eleven?
translation.es: ¿Cómo evitar que corra al centro y vaya a una tienda?

translation.en: Carole, PETA, those characters want to attack everyone.
translation.es: Carole, PETA... Esos personajes quieren atacar a todos.

translation.en: Carole wants to be the last man standing.
translation.es: Carole quiere ser el último hombre en pie.

translation.en: There can be only one, and it has to be her.
translation.es: Solo puede haber uno, y debe ser ella.

translation.en: She's got tens of thousands of people out there brainwashed
translation.es: Ha lavado el cerebro de miles de personas con la idea

translation.en: that we're abusing animals.
translation.es: de que abusamos de los animales.

translation.en: I just called her a plain- out hypocrite.
translation.es: Para mí, es una simple hipócrita.

translation.en: You're open to the public.
translation.es: Estás abierto al público.

translation.en: You're doing boat tours, night tours, day tours, kid tours, kid camps, weddings.
translation.es: Haces paseos en bote, tours nocturnos, diurnos, excursiones para niños, bodas.

translation.en: You name it.
translation.es: Lo que sea.

translation.en: If you're taking photos and stuff,
translation.es: Si toman fotos y cosas así,

translation.en: it'd be great if you would use the hashtag BigCatRescue,
translation.es: sería genial si usan el hashtag Big Cat Rescue

translation.en: so you can find us there. Go ahead and open the gates and go see some cats.
translation.es: para que nos encuentren ahí, así abriremos las puertas para que vean a los felinos.

translation.en: It's a moneymaker for them.
translation.es: Es una mina de oro para ellos.

translation.en: These tickets sold out really fast,
translation.es: Los boletos se vendieron muy rápido,

translation.en: and so we're so happy to see all you guys.
translation.es: estamos felices de verlos a todos.

translation.en: If you're not fuckin' exploiting animals at that point,
translation.es: Si no estás explotando animales en ese momento,

translation.en: what the hell are you doing?
translation.es: ¿qué diablos haces?

translation.en: These guys are checking out Max and Mary- Anne.
translation.es: Están mirando a Max y a Mary Anne.

translation.en: Carole is, I would have to say, a hero of mine.
translation.es: Carole es, diría yo, una heroína para mí.

translation.en: She's an awesome advocate for cats.
translation.es: Es una gran defensora de felinos.

translation.en: These animals have a life to live now. A happy life to live.
translation.es: Estos animales tienen una vida que vivir. Una vida feliz para vivir.

translation.en: And I tell everyone this is like the Ritz- Carlton of animal sanctuaries,
translation.es: Suelo decir que es un hotel de cinco estrellas para los animales,

translation.en: 'cause you just do an amazing job.
translation.es: porque hacen un gran trabajo.

translation.en: - Stop it, you're going to make me cry. - I know.
translation.es: - Basta, vas a hacerme llorar. - Lo sé.

translation.en: In my opinion, Carole Baskin was as bad as Joe.
translation.es: En mi opinión, Carole Baskin era tan mala como Joe.

translation.en: They were both, you know,
translation.es: Ambos se aprovechaban

translation.en: taking advantage of exotic animals to make money.
translation.es: de los animales exóticos para ganar dinero.

translation.en: So, to me, it was just a feud.
translation.es: Para mí, era una pelea.

translation.en: Carole Baskin, yup,
translation.es: Carole Baskin, sí,

translation.en: that lady that profits over 1.5 million dollars
translation.es: esa señora que gana más de 1.5 millones de dólares

translation.en: suckin' on your heartstrings about shit on the internet  that ain't even true!
translation.es: hablando mierda en Internet que ni siquiera es verdad.

translation.en: They are always trying to upset me on social media.
translation.es: Siempre intentan molestarme en las redes sociales.

translation.en: I got a big mouth and a television station.
translation.es: Tengo una bocota y un canal de televisión.

translation.en: - It seems to be. - And that works.
translation.es: - Y eso funciona. - Así parece.

translation.en: Why would you give to a facility to rescue animals
translation.es: ¿Por qué le darías dinero a un lugar que rescata animales

translation.en: to live in luxurious cages?
translation.es: para que vivan en jaulas de lujo?

translation.en: Well, how about that one?
translation.es: Bueno, ¿qué piensas de esta?

translation.en: That mountain lion is sticking his head through a hole in the fence

translation.en: in order to drink out of a--

translation.en: Joe started bashing her. She started bashing him.
translation.es: Joe empezó a atacarla, y ella a él.

translation.en: You know, getting the mall shows canceled.

translation.en: And she put up billboards, and she made this 911 animal abuse site.

translation.en: Joe was one of the top contenders on it.
translation.es: Joe era el objetivo Nº. 1 del sitio.

translation.en: And he would go off on his internet show.

translation.en: I consider that bitch to be one of the biggest terrorists

translation.en: It is financially draining to fight this woman.
translation.es: Es financieramente agotador luchar contra esta mujer.

translation.en: all you gotta do is go to tigercubabuse.com.

translation.en: We got undercover video of him using a 20- week- old cub
translation.es: Tenemos un video oculto de él usando un cachorro de 20 semanas

translation.en: that jumped on this little boy and bit him on the leg.
translation.es: que saltó sobre un niño y lo mordió en la pierna.

translation.en: She's ruthless.
translation.es: Es despiadada.

translation.en: Most of us are not ruthless.
translation.es: Nosotros no somos despiadados.

translation.en: People who really love animals are rarely ruthless.
translation.es: Los amantes de los animales no son despiadados.

translation.en: There shouldn't have to be a place that rescues big cats from abuse
translation.es: No debería existir un lugar que rescate del abuso a los grandes felinos en este país.

translation.en: in this country.
translation.es: que rescate del abuso a los grandes felinos en este país.

translation.en: What we're asking you to do is champion the Big Cat Public Safety Act.
translation.es: Lo que le pedimos es que apoye la Ley de Seguridad de Felinos Grandes.

translation.es: Esta ley acabaría con la propiedad

translation.en: of big cats as exotic pets
translation.es: de grandes felinos como mascotas exóticas

translation.en: and prohibit exhibitors from allowing the public to have contact with them.
translation.es: y prohíbiría a los expositores que el público tenga contacto con ellos.

translation.en: The Big Cat Safety Act, if passed,
translation.es: La Ley de Seguridad de Felinos Grandes, si se aprueba,

translation.en: it will destroy private zoos across America.
translation.es: destruirá los zoológicos privados de todo Estados Unidos.

translation.en: For Carole... and all of her friends that are watching out there,
translation.es: Para Carole y todos sus amigos que nos están mirando.

translation.en: it is my belief...

translation.en: that you will stop breathing.

translation.en: It got pretty ugly.

translation.en: Look at the fangs on that!

translation.en: There are crazy people out there who want to see me dead.
translation.es: Hay gente loca que quiere verme muerta.

translation.en: Happy birthday, Carole.
translation.es: Feliz cumpleaños, Carole.

translation.en: It was just a... hate.

translation.en: He has hate for Carole Baskin. Nasty hate.
translation.es: Odiaba a Carole Baskin. La odiaba mucho.

translation.en: A hundred rounds of .223.

translation.en: You got it. Is that gonna be it or do you need any explosives today?

translation.en: Dynamite.

translation.es: Joe Exotic,
